item.title: Blog | 07/23
item.description: July 13, 2023 Suspicious ADD Activities July 26, 2023 Pseudo-ADD July 13, 2023 Suspicious ADD Activities Dude ðŸ”— uslurped someone else’s proposal. *boom.gif* I’m half-way through the book “Driven To Distraction” (published in 2011), and I already feel as though I’m reading my own life story. A lot of the book is verbatim dictation from the clients of Edward M. Hallowell, M.D., and John J. Ratey, M.D., which is pretty awesome.
